name: WWI Dogfight
description:
This game is is just like my previous game, WWII Dogfight, but it works better and has some different features. You are an American bi-plane fighting through waves of German planes and zeppelins. In the future, I would like to add more waves and eventually make it endless. I will also put a score counter in so you can see your score and try to beat your previous one.

Controls:

Arrows-Move

F-Fire

ESC-exit fullscreen
